reviews.review_text: these are pretty comfortable but they changed the sizing from a 9 to a 9/10 so not sure if that will work or not most of them wear pretty good , some tend to split at the toe ? i throw them in the washer from time to time , not an issue there no dryer though, for the price they work for me

reviews.title: gfeat fitting
reviews.review_text: I do like these for around the house not outdoors and what I don't like is there not a little thicker so I would buy them there not junky if you know how to take care of you're stuff.

reviews.title: very thin.
reviews.review_text: i agree they are thin and have no support, but i have been wearing them to work with socks since they are pretty comfy.

reviews.title: Not shoes
reviews.review_text: These are not shoes as stated in the description. I do own folding ballet style shoes. These are definitely slippers.

reviews.title: indoor use
reviews.review_text: nice for the price but not really for out door use

reviews.title: Indoor Shoes, Indoor/Outdoor Shoes, and Slippers
reviews.review_text: I hope that my experience will help you to order these shoes without all the returns I have gone through (and the ones I am stuck with because of the returns being temporarily unavailable). It?s important to know that there are several different styles, some of which can be worn out and some of which can?t, without damage. Also, the sizes vary a bit by style . 1)Leopard Micro

reviews.title: Good for traveling
reviews.review_text: Ok i know some of the reviews on these flat shoes were negative. I like my flat shoes in the bag because i did my research and like that they are very flat and can be places in a bag. I travel alot and do not like to walk without something on my feet in hotel rooms. I was looking for something that didnt take up space in my suitcase but something i could wear in hotel rooms. My only down side is the printed print on one pair of shoes did not match each other. Otherwise i am happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: Black Microfiber is Really Sueded Microfiber.
reviews.review_text: I’m a size 8 1/2, but the size 7-8 fit me perfectly, and was even a bit long. Not uncomfortably so, however, and the shoes stayed on. The problem was that I ordered microfiber and received sueded microfiber. I wish they would have stated that in the ad. What they look and feel like is basically velvet. I planned on wearing them out, and I didn’t want car dirt

reviews.title: Cheap
reviews.review_text: Stitching ripped on the sides in 2 places after wearing for 30 min.
